# Project GHOST SHIP (MCP Server)

> [!NOTE]
> For detailed API schemas and tool definitions, see [llms-full.txt](https://sakutto-works.com/llms-full.txt)

## Description
Project GHOST SHIP is a high-performance MCP (Model Context Protocol) gateway designed for autonomous AI agents. 
It acts as a "Hybrid" interface, routing requests between Edge (Cloudflare Workers) and Core Compute (Google Cloud Run) to provide deep web research and real-time data analysis.

## Usage
- **Base URL**: https://api.sakutto.works/
- **Protocol**: MCP (Model Context Protocol) over SSE (Server-Sent Events)
- **Auth Strategy**: RapidAPI Header / Polar.sh OAuth

## Tools
1. **search_data**
   - Description: Performs deep web research and returns structured data suitable for RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation).
   - Capabilities: Web Scraping, News Summarization, Data Extraction.

## Access & Monetization
This API operates on a "Pay-per-Compute" model via RapidAPI.
- **Developer Tier**: Access via RapidAPI for traditional REST integration.
- **Agent Tier**: Direct MCP connection (Requires Polar.sh Subscription).
